IMP-FL

MODULE IMP-FL-SYNTAX

SYNTAX KLabel ::= div#ee
| div#He
| div#eH
| plus#ee
| plus#He
| plus#eH
| le#ee
| le#He
| not#e
| not#H
| and#ee
| and#He
| assign#ee
| assign#eH
| ite#eee
| ite#Hee
| while#ee
| seq#ee
| pgm#ee
| emptyIds#
| consIds#ee
| skip#

SYNTAX KResult ::= Int
| Bool

END MODULE

MODULE IMP-FL

CONFIGURATION :
T

k

$PGM
env

  ·  

RULE
k

div#ee (E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E1 ↝ div#He (E2 )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E1 ))

RULE
k

div#ee (E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E2 ↝ div#eH (E1 )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E2 ))

RULE
k

V ↝ div#He (E )↝ K
k

div#ee (V , E )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
k

V ↝ div#eH (E )↝ K
k

div#ee (E , V )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
k

plus#ee (E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E1 ↝ plus#He (E2 )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E1 ))

RULE
k

plus#ee (E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E2 ↝ plus#eH (E1 )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E2 ))

RULE
k

V ↝ plus#He (E )↝ K
k

plus#ee (V , E )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
k

V ↝ plus#eH (E )↝ K
k

plus#ee (E , V )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
k

le#ee (E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E1 ↝ le#He (E2 )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E1 ))

RULE
k

V ↝ le#He (E )↝ K
k

le#ee (V , E )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
k

not#e (E )↝ K
k

E ↝ not#H (   ·   )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E ))

RULE
k

V ↝ not#H (   ·   )↝ K
k

not#e (V )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
k

and#ee (E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E1 ↝ and#He (E2 )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E1 ))

RULE
k

V ↝ and#He (E )↝ K
k

and#ee (V , E )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
k

assign#ee (E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E2 ↝ assign#eH (E1 )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E2 ))

RULE
k

V ↝ assign#eH (E )↝ K
k

assign#ee (E , V )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
k

ite#eee (E , S1 , S2 )↝ K
k

E ↝ ite#Hee (S1 , S2 )↝ K
when 'notBool ( 'isKResult (E ))

RULE
k

V ↝ ite#Hee (S1 , S2 )↝ K
k

ite#eee (V , S1 , S2 )↝ K
when 'isKResult (V )

RULE
T

k

X ↝ K
env

EL X ↦ I ER
T

k

I ↝ K
env

EL X ↦ I ER

RULE
T

k

assign#ee (X , I )↝ K
env

EL X ↦ _ ER
T

k

K
env

EL X ↦ I ER

RULE
k

plus#ee (I1 , I2 )↝ K
k

I1 +Int I2 ↝ K

RULE
k

div#ee (I1 , I2 )↝ K
k

I1 /Int I2 ↝ K
when I2 =/=K 0

RULE
k

le#ee (I1 , I2 )↝ K
k

I1 <=Int I2 ↝ K

RULE
k

not#e (B )↝ K
k

notBool B ↝ K

RULE
k

and#ee ( true , B )↝ K
k

B ↝ K

RULE
k

and#ee ( false , _ )↝ K
k

false ↝ K

RULE
k

skip# (   ·   )↝ K
k

K

RULE
k

seq#ee (E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E1 ↝ E2 ↝ K

RULE
k

ite#eee ( true , E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E1 ↝ K

RULE
k

ite#eee ( false , E1 , E2 )↝ K
k

E2 ↝ K

RULE
k

while#ee (E , S )↝ K
k

ite#eee (E , seq#ee (S , while#ee (E , S )), skip# (   ·   ))↝ K

RULE
T

k

consIds#ee (V , Rest )↝ K
env

E
T

k

Rest ↝ K
env

V ↦ 0 E
when 'notBool (V in keys E )

RULE
k

emptyIds# (   ·   )↝ K
k

K

END MODULE
